result.purpose: Responsible for handling consumer check-in events and tracking metrics in a wallet quest application.
result.architecture: The folder follows a modular architecture pattern, focusing on event-driven processing and metrics tracking.

internal/domains/quest/consumers/metrics.purpose: Defines and initializes metrics for tracking consumer check-ins in a wallet quest application.

internal/domains/quest/consumers/roninch.purpose: Handles check-in events for Ronin contracts using Kafka consumer messages.
